DataElement.preferredDefinition: The calendar date of the follow-up prostate gland biopsy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information pertaining to the health status of  the male reproductive system just below the bladder and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A gland in the male reproductive system just below the bladder. It surrounds part of the urethra, the canal that empties the bladder. It produces a fluid that forms part of semen. (NCI-GLOSS):Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.

Concepts.definition: The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.
The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed.

Concepts.definition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.origin: CAP PROTOCOLS:College of American Pathologists Cancer Protocols
